import React, { Fragment, useState, useEffect } from "react"; const Create_User_Ticket = ({ setAuth }) => { const [info, setInfo] = useState(""); const onSubmitForm = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { const body = { info }; const response = await fetch("http://localhost:5000/tickets", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" }, body: JSON.stringify(body), }); window.location = "/dashboard"; } catch (err) { console.error(err.message); } }; return (
